Line 425:                      <p>Dynamic Bundles</p>
Line 426:                      <ul>
Line 427:                          <li>
Line 428:                              Bundles are auto generated. No need to create bundles yourself.
Line 429:                          </li>
Line 430:                          <li>
Line 431:                              Ensures only required CSS and JavaScript files are loaded, and in the right order.
Line 432:                          </li>
Line 433:                          <li>
Line 434:                              Optimizes client side caching, by combining files into bundles by area, controller, shared and layout. 
Line 435:                          </li>
Line 436:                          <li>
Line 437:                              When CSS and JavaScript files are added or deleted,
Line 438:                              new bundles are automatically generated to take account of this
Line 439:                          </li>
Line 440:                      </ul>

Line 448:      }
Line 449:  }
